markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ancestor's Rage](/Feats.aspx?ID=2803) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gnoll" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=219" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 113 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You transform into an enormous otherworldly hyena. You can cast [_animal form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=10) (canine form only) once per day as a 5th-level occult innate spell.
name: Ancestor's Rage
